name: UIStackView
desc: A streamlined interface for laying out a collection of views in either a column or a row.

items.name: init(arrangedSubviews: [UIView])
items.desc: Returns a new stack view object that manages the provided views.

items.name: func addArrangedSubview(UIView)
items.desc: Adds a view to the end of the arrangedSubviews array.

items.name: var arrangedSubviews: [UIView]
items.desc: The list of views arranged by the stack view.

items.name: func insertArrangedSubview(UIView, at: Int)
items.desc: Adds the provided view to the array of arranged subviews at the specified index.

items.name: func removeArrangedSubview(UIView)
items.desc: Removes the provided view from the stack’s array of arranged subviews.

items.name: var alignment: UIStackView.Alignment
items.desc: The alignment of the arranged subviews perpendicular to the stack view’s axis.

items.name: var axis: NSLayoutConstraint.Axis
items.desc: The axis along which the arranged views are laid out.

items.name: var isBaselineRelativeArrangement: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that determines whether the vertical spacing between views is measured from their baselines.

items.name: var distribution: UIStackView.Distribution
items.desc: The distribution of the arranged views along the stack view’s axis.

items.name: var isLayoutMarginsRelativeArrangement: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that determines whether the stack view lays out its arranged views relative to its layout margins.

items.name: var spacing: CGFloat
items.desc: The distance in points between the adjacent edges of the stack view’s arranged views.

items.name: func customSpacing(after: UIView) -> CGFloat
items.desc: Returns the custom spacing after the specified view.

items.name: func setCustomSpacing(CGFloat, after: UIView)
items.desc: Applies custom spacing after the specified view.

items.name: class let spacingUseDefault: CGFloat
items.desc: The default spacing for subviews within a stack view.

items.name: class let spacingUseSystem: CGFloat
items.desc: The system-defined spacing to the neighboring view.

items.name: enum UIStackView.Distribution
items.desc: The layout that defines the size and position of the arranged views along the stack view’s axis.

items.name: enum UIStackView.Alignment
items.desc: The layout of arranged views perpendicular to the stack view’s axis.
